title: Lalli

He seems to be constantly paranoid that the player wants to steal his golden apples. Lalli is the only known troll cook who does not eat humans. Lalli

Advanced data
NPC ID803

Lalli is a troll cook that guards the Golden Apple Tree. He is needed in The Fremennik Trials to get the golden wool required to make the lyre. He seems to be constantly paranoid that the player wants to steal his golden apples. Lalli is the only known troll cook who does not eat humans. He is fooled by the player and a pet rock during this quest.

He can be reached quickly by using the fairy ring AJR to get to the Rellekka Slayer Caves. Slower methods include using the enchanted lyre to teleport to the Rellekka area or by teleporting to a player-owned house (if set to Rellekka or with a Rellekka teleport).

Stock[edit | edit source]

After the quest, the golden fleece can be bought for 1000 coins each from him.

ItemPrice
sold at
Golden fleece 1,000

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • In the original version of The Fremennik Trials featured in the RuneScape 2 beta, he appeared as the character Lalli.
